description: Salford keep up their hopes of a League Two play-off charge with a thrilling 3-2 over Bromley win at Hayes Lane.
title: Bromley 2-3 Salford City
maintext:
This will be just the second Football League meeting between Bromley and Salford City, with the pair drawing 3-3 in February earlier this year.
Salford City have won just one of their last six league games against sides from London (D2 L3), losing on their last visit to the capital (1-0 vs AFC Wimbledon in February).
Bromley have lost just one of their last five home league games (W3 D1), keeping a clean sheet in each of those wins.
